original_title: Five takeaways from a week of Trump’s Ukraine diplomacy — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has rejected any territorial concessions by Ukraine in negotiations with Russia, emphasizing that such decisions must be made by Kiev. Merz compared the Russian demand for Ukraine to give up parts of Donbass to a proposal for the US to give up Florida. Trump has urged Ukraine to drop its NATO membership aspirations and relinquish claims to Crimea as preconditions for peace talks with Russia.</s>
